author: Christopher Smith
comment: This app is not compatible with the Sony Smart Watch 3. On a SW3 you can not get past the calibration screen regardless of how you try calibrating it. i.e. the instructions in video does not correct thr problem users are having so is seems silly to continue to respond with a video that does not actually help. It would be beter to list the watches you have confirmed it works on...

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Please calibrate the watch correctly as described in the instructions. See this youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k1EPbAapaeI. Please review again. Thanks

title: Cant get past calibrate

author: Nic Kir
comment: literally is not compatible. why make an android wear app that isn't compatible with an android wear watch (moto 360)? will give better review when it's compatible. in response to the developer: did you read my comment? I said make it compatible. and maybe be less sassy in your reply...

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Did you read the description? It says it is not compatible. Thank you for feedback.

author: SouthPole Cat
comment: Unfortunately, cannot give it zero stars. Does NOT WORK on Sony SW 3 - plain and simple. Yes, I watched the instruction video provided to other reviewer with the same problem  (it is NOT for the watch!)

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Please calibrate the watch correctly as described in the instructions. See this youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5AQJxE9fG2k. Please review again. Thanks

author: John L. Stanley
comment: Works on my Sony Smartwatch 3.  Would give 5 stars if the author added a smoothing/averaging function so it wasn't so jittery.  (It's twitching +/- 10 degrees even with watch placed on motionless table and no EMF sources nearby...)
title: Works mostly

comment: Doesn't work on Zenwatch 2. Figured it would if it worked with 1. Oh well, hope there is an update some day. Would be really useful.
